name: Maybe: Interactive Stories
storyline: Become the main character in an exciting love story: customize the characters from your favorite episodes and novels, and choose between stories of love, secrets, adventures, or passion.
summary: Maybe: Interactive Stories is a visual novel app full of originally-written novels, as well as beloved classics from NAVER such as Remarried Empress, Lady in Armour, A Good Day To Be A Dog, as well as so much more! Collect outfits, special interactions with your favourite characters, and look at a collection of fantastic illustrations created by numerous illustrators in every chapter! Romance, drama, fantasy, thriller—a variety of visual novels that are updated weekly are waiting for you!
